modName: -Do You Wanna Build A Snowman- Combat Music ADD-ON
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, I hope you like it!

This won't replace any music files and should therefore be compatible with most other mods. However, if you do find any issues with the mod, tell me in the comments and I'll see what I can do about it.

If you're like me, you are not annoyed by this song no matter how many times you've probably see it on the internet. I love "Frozen"! This mod adds a remixed version of "Do you wanna build a Snowman?" from Frozen, inspired by Kingdom Hearts, to the game's battle music. I did not make this remix! This music was created by BlueNctrn from YouTube. Check out the song in the video tab to see what it sounds like.

I recommend the Elsa standalone follower mod by Jokerine. That way you can ask your enemies if they want to build snowmen! They'll probably say no like Elsa did in the movie, so you kill them! Here is the mod:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51950/?

Again, it does NOT replace any music. It's a standalone mod that simply just adds another song.

Enjoy!
author: xxprawnsxx

files.name: Do You Wanna Build A Snowman
